title: Slow Cooker Chicken Tortellini Soup
directions: Place the chicken, carrots, celery, garlic, onion, chicken, chicken stock, basil, oregano, thyme, and rosemary into a 6-quart slow cooker. Mix until combined.
Cook on high for 3 hours or on low for 6 hours.
Taste and season with salt and pepper.
Place the three-cheese tortellini into the soup and mix. Cook on high for another 15 minutes.
ingredients: 3 medium carrots, peeled and finely diced
